analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Namahaggataṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā mahaggato kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: na mahaggatam na kusalam dhammam paccayā mahaggataḥ kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā nava pe avigate nava

original: Namahaggataṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā paritto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na mahaggatam na akusalam dhammam paccayā parittaḥ akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Naparittaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca paritto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: na parittam na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca parittaḥ abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha adhipatiyā cha pe avigate cha
